title: Still cant redeem
body: Dear Riot.. I posted a couple of days back about my Firecracker Jinx icon and how I seem to be unable to unlock it. Again, I've been trying everyday constantly to try and unlock but I haven't been successful. I have already submitted a help ticket and this icon loses the ability to unlock it in 8 days. Help a summoner out?

replies.body: Hey Hydra, do you have a ticket number you can provide?
The order number? Yes I have one.
Ah, I mean the Player Support ticket number.
Every time that I go to look at my support ticket it says that I don't have any even though I know I did one.

Did you get an automated email response when you first submitted the ticket? It should have said something to the effect of "Thanks for contacting our Player Support Team! We received your request (#xxxxxxxx)" then maybe something about them being busier than normal. The xxxxx will be the ticket number if you have it.
don't worry! I recently received an email from Riot about the support ticket! Thanks for the help anyways!
Glad it all got sorted out :)

Someone should get back to you on the ticket within a couple days, but avoid creating a new one or responding to the existing one before someone does, because it can bump you back to the bottom of the queue. 

Your best bet is to simply wait for support at this point. If it does expire before they can get it fixed for you, they can likely credit the icon directly to your account if you give them the code.
Did someone get back to you? A support member just got back to me about mine and is going to credit it to the account for me.
Nope... And I've only got 4 days to go to unlock it.
